definition[0]: the activity of buying, selling, or doing business with people
definition[1]: the job or activity of buying and selling stocks, shares, foreign currencies etc on a financial market
example[2]: After the first hour of dealing, the FTSE had slipped 10.1 to 3025.3.
example[3]: Share dealings in the new issue will begin on Dec. 8.
example[4]: a full range of currency dealing services
definition[2]: the business relationships or activities that you have become involved in
example[5]: The secret dealings of his department were made public.
example[6]: Anyone who has had dealings with an insurance company knows how long it takes for payment to be made.
